titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to Lieutenant Colonel John Macdonald, Envoy to the Court of Persia

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Colonel Stannus's recent trip to the Arabian Coast and the circumstances which caused him to extend it longer than usual.The letter reports on the Colonel's visit to Kishm [Qeshm] including his visit to the Shaik of Bushire (‘Abd al-Rasūl Khān) who had been captured by the Imam of Muscat and was being held on one of his vessels; the change of Government at Bushire, and the difficulties being caused by the new Governor not having been ratified by the Government at Shiraz; and the application of Shaikh Nassir [Nasir] (eldest son of ‘Abd al-Rasūl Khān) for asylum at the Residency.
